title: Vegetarian Lasagna
ingredients: 200g lasagna sheets. 150g ricotta cheese. 200g spinach. 300g tomato sauce. 100g mozzarella.
steps: Layer the lasagna sheets with spinach, ricotta, and tomato sauce. Top with mozzarella and bake for 30 minutes.

title: Chickpea Curry
ingredients: 200g chickpeas. 1 onion. 1 tbsp curry powder. 200ml coconut milk. 1 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Saute the onion in olive oil. Add chickpeas and curry powder. Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 15 minutes.

title: Vegetarian Tacos
ingredients: 4 taco shells. 200g black beans. 100g corn. 50g lettuce. 50g salsa. 50g shredded cheese.
steps: Heat the taco shells. Fill with black beans, corn, and lettuce. Top with salsa and shredded cheese.

title: Caprese Salad
ingredients: 200g cherry tomatoes. 150g mozzarella balls. 20g fresh basil. 2 tbsp olive oil. 1 tbsp balsamic glaze.
steps: Slice the tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange on a plate with basil. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic glaze.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: 2 bell peppers. 100g quinoa. 100g black beans. 50g diced tomatoes. 50g shredded cheese.
steps: Cut the bell peppers in half and remove seeds. Stuff with quinoa, beans, and tomatoes. Top with cheese and bake for 20 minutes.

title: Vegetarian Fried Rice
ingredients: 200g cooked rice. 1 carrot. 50g peas. 2 eggs. 2 tbsp soy sauce. 1 tbsp sesame oil.
steps: Scramble the eggs. Saute carrot and peas in sesame oil. Add rice, eggs, and soy sauce, and stir-fry for 5 minutes.

title: Mushroom Stroganoff
ingredients: 200g mushrooms. 1 onion. 200ml sour cream. 200g pasta. 1 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Saute onions and mushrooms in olive oil. Add sour cream and simmer. Serve over cooked pasta.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: 100g broccoli. 100g bell peppers. 50g carrots. 2 tbsp soy sauce. 1 tbsp sesame oil.
steps: Heat sesame oil in a pan. Add broccoli, bell peppers, and carrots. Stir-fry for 5 minutes and add soy sauce.

title: Spinach and Feta Quiche
ingredients: 1 pie crust. 200g spinach. 100g feta cheese. 4 eggs. 200ml milk.
steps: Pre-bake the pie crust. Whisk eggs and milk. Add spinach and feta to the crust and pour the egg mixture on top. Bake for 30 minutes.

title: Zucchini Noodles with Pesto
ingredients: 2 zucchinis. 50g pesto. 50g cherry tomatoes. 1 tbsp olive oil.
steps: Spiralize the zucchinis. Saute in olive oil for 2 minutes. Mix with pesto and cherry tomatoes.

title: Vegetarian Chili
ingredients: 200g kidney beans. 100g black beans. 200g diced tomatoes. 1 onion. 1 tbsp chili powder.
steps: Saute onions in a pot. Add beans, diced tomatoes, and chili powder. Simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Slice the eggplant and coat with breadcrumbs. Bake until crispy. Layer with marinara and mozzarella and bake for another 15 minutes.
